content.text:
Code
  Description


  x+
  Matches at least one x


  x*
  Matches zero or more occurrences of x


  x?
  Matches zero or one occurrences of x


  x{n}
  Matches n occurences of x


  x{n,m}
  Matches from n to m occurences of x


  x{n,}
  Matches n or more occurences of x
x+ matches matches at least one x.
x* matches zero or more occurrences of x.
x? matches zero or one occurrences of x.
x{n} matches n occurences of x.
x{n,m} matches from n to m occurences of x.
x{n,} matches n or more occurences of x.
Regular Expression Search and Replace can be done with different methods.

data: Returns the index of the first match
